channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4601|2024-09-13T14:17:09.349Z -- ni -- system%20configuration
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in NI System Configuration that could result in information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires that an attacker can provide a specially crafted response. This affects NI System Configuration 2023 Q3 and all previous versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4080|2024-08-01T20:33:51.649Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in LabVIEW tdcore.dll may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4081|2024-08-01T20:33:52.219Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in NI LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects NI LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4079|2024-08-01T20:33:51.641Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4044|2024-08-01T20:26:57.269Z -- ni -- flexlogger
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in common code used by FlexLogger and InstrumentStudio that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects NI FlexLogger 2024 Q1 and prior versions as well as NI InstrumentStudio 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6121|2024-07-29T16:55:16.740Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An out-of-date version of Redis shipped with NI SystemLink Server is susceptible to multiple vulnerabilities, including CVE-2022-24834. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6675|2024-07-24T18:39:50.292Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4081|2024-07-24T13:26:36.820Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in NI LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects NI LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6793|2024-07-23T16:10:26.367Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand DataLogging Server that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to send a specially crafted message. These vulnerabilities affect NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6122|2024-07-23T13:33:07.543Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An incorrect permission in the installation directory for the shared NI SystemLink Server KeyValueDatabase service may result in information disclosure via local access. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-4079|2024-07-23T13:19:35.141Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4081|2024-07-23T13:32:52.584Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in NI LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects NI LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-5602|2024-07-23T13:15:50.508Z -- ni -- io%20trace%20tool
item.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to a missing bounds check in the NI I/O Trace Tool may result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted nitrace file.
The NI I/O Trace tool is installed as part of the NI System Configuration utilities included with many NI software products. Refer to the NI Security Advisory for identifying the version of NI IO Trace.exe installed. The NI I/O Trace tool was also previously released as NI Spy.

item.title: CVE-2024-4080|2024-07-23T13:29:55.012Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in LabVIEW tdcore.dll may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6791|2024-07-23T13:21:33.849Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A directory path traversal vulnerability exists when loading a vsmodel file in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted .vsmodel file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6793|2024-07-22T20:47:52.793Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand DataLogging Server that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to send a specially crafted message. These vulnerabilities affect NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6794|2024-07-22T20:50:40.727Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand Waveform Streaming Server that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to send a specially crafted message. These vulnerabilities affect NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6675|2024-07-22T20:01:15.981Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6791|2024-07-22T20:38:14.144Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A directory path traversal vulnerability exists when loading a vsmodel file in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted .vsmodel file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4044|2024-06-04T17:54:22.689Z -- ni -- flexlogger
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in common code used by FlexLogger and InstrumentStudio that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects NI FlexLogger 2024 Q1 and prior versions as well as NI InstrumentStudio 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6121|2024-07-22T19:46:11.685Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An out-of-date version of Redis shipped with NI SystemLink Server is susceptible to multiple vulnerabilities, including CVE-2022-24834. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6638|2024-07-22T19:55:23.548Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability due to improper input validation when reading TDMS files in LabVIEW may result in an infinite loop. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted TDMS file. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6122|2024-07-22T19:27:10.034Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An incorrect permission in the installation directory for the shared NI SystemLink Server KeyValueDatabase service may result in information disclosure via local access. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6806|2024-07-22T21:03:16.156Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: The NI VeriStand Gateway is missing authorization checks when an actor attempts to access Project resources. These missing checks may result in remote code execution. This affects NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6805|2024-07-22T21:00:21.584Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: The NI VeriStand Gateway is missing authorization checks when an actor attempts to access File Transfer resources. These missing checks may result in information disclosure or remote code execution. This affects NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6791|2024-07-23T14:32:29.198Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A directory path traversal vulnerability exists when loading a vsmodel file in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted .vsmodel file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-5602|2024-07-23T14:11:46.604Z -- ni -- io%20trace%20tool
item.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to a missing bounds check in the NI I/O Trace Tool may result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted nitrace file.
The NI I/O Trace tool is installed as part of the NI System Configuration utilities included with many NI software products. Refer to the NI Security Advisory for identifying the version of NI IO Trace.exe installed. The NI I/O Trace tool was also previously released as NI Spy.
